snippet: Terms used to describe magazine content on tablets are inconsistent, and the type of data that can be collected on readers varies by device.
abstract: Association of Magazine Media is set to announce a set of voluntary guidelines covering how magazines measure their tablet editions, vocabulary used in those definitions and time frames for when reader data will be released.
lead_paragraph: Terms used to describe magazine content on tablets are inconsistent, and the type of data that can be collected on readers varies by device.

headline.seo: Magazine Group Offers Guidelines for Tablets
